resources.string: "Click into the script list and create a new script."
"Click into the script list and select a script."
"Do you want to save your modification?"
"Click the "+" button to create a new script."

"Good morning. My name is (name). I have been working on rocket science in Professor Smith\'\'s lab at MIT for the past three years. I am very excited to explore my career options here at NASA and see how my expertise can contribute to the team"
Hi (name)! I haven\'\'t seen you in ages! What have you been up to lately?\nSorry, but I have to get going. It was great chatting with you. Let\'\'s get together again sometime!

"Hello, I am (name). I have three advantages:
First, I am a team player. I am good at inspiring morale, lead the team to achieve their goals. I once served as captain of Taiwan University badminton team, and led the team to get the year''s college cup runner-up. It was the school team''s best ever.
Second, I am very results-oriented. No matter which field, I can always conquer difficulties in the shortest possible time, create performance and achieve goals. When I was a project manager at Nestlé, I was able to meet performance targets for 24 consecutive months.
Finally, I have the entrepreneurial spirit. I am often given the task of new business. Last season, I introduced the "coffee education and training activities" in Nestlé, it was very successful and all the classes were fully registered until end of the year.
Based on the above characteristics, I believe I can make a great contribution to the company. Thank you."

"Good morning sir. How may I help you?
Do you have a reservation?
May I have your ID or passport please?
Would you like a single room or a double room?
How many days are you staying?
Please let us know if you need anything else, and have a wonderful stay!"
"Once turned off, the system will not record the video during conversation for your later review. Are your sure to turn it off?"
"Smile mirror requires Camera, Microphone and Storage permissions to show your mirrored image on the display, and be able to optionally record video during conversations for your later review."
"Storage space not enough to save the script."
"You need to update your Google Play services component. Please check your network settings and try again."
